title: Priyanka Chopra Just Walked Into the Royal Wedding in the Most Magical Shade of Lavender
content: Priyanka Chopra adorably told People, "I have to wear a hat to this thing I'm going to soon, and a friend of mine recommended a fascinator, and I didn't know what that meant, so I googled, 'What is the meaning of a fascinator?'" Of course, she was referring to the royal wedding, and though she made herself out to be a "newbie," Priyanka could have fooled us!  Working with stylist Mimi Cuttrell, the Quantico star, and very good friend to Meghan Markle, arranged for a custom Vivienne Westwood look. Priyanka wore lavender down to her toes, accessorizing with a Philip Treacy hat and stunning Lorraine Schwartz jewels. She stepped onto the scene with fellow actress Abigail Spencer, but when it came to standing out from the crowd, Priyanka clearly took the reins.  Ahead, read on to catch a glimpse of Priyanka's every angle, then get details on what the rest of the guests wore for the big day.      Related:                                                                                                           Victoria Beckhams Outfit at the Royal Wedding? Oh Baby, It Was Posh                  via POPSUGAR Fashion https://ift.tt/2r9OnLx
